db:abstract.db:para: [unresolved-alias] Property of property alias was not found.

db:article.db:para: This warning category is spelled [unresolved-alias] by qmllint.

db:section.db:title: What happened?
db:section.db:para: A property alias should hold a reference to another property, see also QML Object Attributes - Property Aliases. In this case, it holds a reference to a property that was not found.

db:section.db:title: Why is this bad?
db:section.db:para: Instances of components with unresolved alias will not be created at runtime: they will be null instead.

db:section.db:title: Example
db:section.db:para: To fix this warning, make sure that the id and the property of the alias property really do exist:
